data.quote: Do not seek to follow in the footsteps of the wise. Seek what they sought.
data.author: Matsuo Bashō

data.quote: Every day is a journey, and the journey itself is home.
data.author: Matsuo Bashō

data.quote: Real poetry, is to lead a beautiful life. To live poetry is better than to write it.
data.author: Matsuo Bashō

data.quote: No matter where your interest lies, you will not be able to accomplish anything unless you bring your deepest devotion to it.
data.author: Matsuo Bashō

data.quote: Before enlightenment, chopping wood and carrying water. After enlightenment, chopping wood and carrying water.
data.author: Matsuo Bashō

data.quote: Plunge deep enough in order to see something that is hidden and glimmering.
data.author: Matsuo Bashō
